knimeNode.name: Open URL/File
knimeNode.shortDescription: Opens a URL/File with the default application or a specified one.

fullDescription.intro: Opens a URL/File with the default application or a specified one.
fullDescription.option: The URL or file to open. The '$' will be replaced by the content of the selected column. The character '$' can be replaced with '\$'
The command used to open the URL or file. If this is unchecked the preferred application is used. This is done by using the command start under Windows, open under Mac and xdg-open under Linux.
Limits the table size, in order to not accidentally open to many windows.
